channel.title: Tomcat on ChaGu CTF
channel.description: Recent content in Tomcat on ChaGu CTF

item.title: Insomni'hack teaser: Smarttomcat (web 50)
item.description: For this challenge, you are supposed to enter the correct coordinates to find the robot cat. For these types of challenges, I like using burp suite in order to record and modify HTTP requests. The following request was recorded when entering some random values. POST /index.php HTTP/1.1 Host: smarttomcat.teaser.insomnihack.ch User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.12; rv:50.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/50.0 Accept: */* Accept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.5 Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8 X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequest Referer: http://smarttomcat.
